channel.title: Staying Relevant on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in Staying Relevant on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: 53: The Return Of The King | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description The King and Queen of Australia are home! Sam and Pete have returned from their trip to Australia and we have a new king of the I’m A Celeb jungle. Sam reveals all about his time in the jungle and Pete shuts down all of the rumours about his face and love interests… Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 52: From The Vault: Sam & Pete Answer Their First Listener Dilemma & React To Your Icks | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam’s still away but in the meantime Sam & Pete made sure they left you with some gold content from The Vault! Sam & Pete try to solve a listeners dilemma for the first time and Pete realises he’s a total social media ‘ick.’ Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 51: Karen Thompson (Sam's Mum) & Zara McDermott | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam’s still in the jungle so we have gotten the two most important women in his life on the podcast to spill the tea and get their reaction to Sam going on I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 50: Nemesis Special: Roman Kemp | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Trigger Warning: In this episode Roman discusses themes of suicide and depression in relation to his best friend Joe and his documentary, this is approximately between 43m 50s - 51m 48s. If you’re not in the right headspace to hear this right now, please skip this section. Remember, help is always available - you can contact the Samaritans 24 hours a day at 116 123. Sam’s away in the jungle, but before he went down under we made sure he came face to face with his nemesis Roman Kemp!

item.title: 49: Sam's Leaving Do! | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam is off to Australia to do I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here! To celebrate Sam’s new Staying Relevant status, Pete is throwing him a leaving party. Expect inflatable kangaroos, cork bucket hats and Sam spilling the tea on how he is feeling ahead of his jungle journey. However, this episode isn’t just about Sam as the team learn that Pete has been spotted in a rather unusual location in the UK.

item.title: 48: Nemesis Special: Ovie Soko | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description This week, Pete comes face to face with his nemesis, Ovie Soko! Apart from Ovie being one of the nicest, best looking, tallest men in the industry, what has Pete got to worry about?! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 47: Zara McDermott Stands In For Sam Thompson | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam has had his wisdom tooth removed and has taken the week off so we’ve called in the cavalry to co-host with Pete, the one and only Zara McDermott! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 46: Happy Birthday Staying Relevant! | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description It’s our first birthday! Sam and Pete look back through the best moments from the past year as voted for by YOU! But that’s not all, as Pete surprises Sam with a very special gift and the Staying Relevant production team comes through with some unexpected gifts… Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 45: Sammy Root | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Love Island Winner 2023 Sammy Root is here with Sam & Pete! In his first ever podcast appearance, Sammy is talking all things Love Island, his break-up with Jess and how he would LOVE to do Dancing On Ice. Also, can we sense a new bromance blossoming between Sammy & Pete? Move over Sam! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now.

item.title: 44: Sam & Pete Hosted The Pride Of Britain Red Carpet | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description You may have seen one of the biggest shows on TV from your sofa but, little do you know, there was a lot more than met the eye. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 43: Luisa Zissman & Anna Williamson ("LuAnna") | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description It’s the podcast collab of podcast collabs! LuAnna join Sam & Pete this week to discuss all things GIANT MONOPOLY, how Luisa and Anna met & crotch smelling. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 42: Post-Podcast Awards - The Losers' Choice | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description It’s the morning after The British Podcast Awards and, as you have seen, the boys DIDN’T win. However, we aren’t leaving it at that because Sam reveals exactly what Pete got up to that night. And now THAT is award-worthy. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 41: Pete Was Naked In Front Of A Crowd Of Women & Sam Met Zara’s Strictly Come Dancing Partner | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete were on our screens on Saturday night in the Strictly Come Dancing audience, and they recorded a little heads up for us before … Plus, find out what brought together Pete thrusting naked in a room full of women with Jedward, and why Sam felt like the Justin Bieber of the Harry Potter world for one day (we can’t believe we just wrote that either). Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now.

item.title: 40: Sam & Pete At The NTAs: Part 2 | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete are back with part 2 of the NTAs special and there’s SO much more to cover! Sam addresses the real reason he wore Crocs on the red carpet whilst Pete clears up some rumours about the numerous women he has been linked with. As well as all that juicy gossip, Pete also reveals what really happened between Faye Winter and Maura Higgins in that ’explosive’ row.

item.title: 39: Sam & Pete At The NTAs: Part 1 | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete are red carpet hosts! Or so they thought they were… In this episode we hear the moment that Pete found out that he WASN’T hosting the red-carpet, the boys almost get turned away from the NTAs and Sam FINALLY meets Ant & Dec. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 38: Sam & Pete Have Landed Their Dream Jobs! | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam and Pete are officially red carpet hosts, and at The Pride Of Britain Awards & The National Television Awards no less! But that’s not all, Sam sabotages a radio promotions for a new rival podcast and Pete is now obsessed with a new reality show. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 37: Pete Was Recognised By Lewis Capaldi & Sam Was Tackled By A Rapper's Security | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description There is never a dull week in the world of Staying Relevant and what a week it’s been for the boys. Sam went across the pond to New York and almost got kicked out of a bar (and got tackled by Flo Rida’s bouncer?!) Pete on the other hand has been making waves in the celeb world and the Daily Mail … PLUS! This is the last week you can vote for us for The Listeners’ Choice Award (you’ll be pleased to know!

item.title: 36: Sam & Pete Reach New Staying Relevant Heights & An Ex Love Islander Named Sam As His Nemesis | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Could this be the biggest stunt that Sam & Pete have pulled to stay relevant EVER? With the closing date on The British Podcast Awards, Listeners’ Choice Award looming, Sam and Pete are pulling out all the stops to get YOUR votes. By the way, you can vote here… BUT this episode is not just about that, Sam congratulates Zara on being announced for Strictly Come Dancing and Pete does some digging to see if Sam is feeling nervous about it.

item.title: 35: Pete's Pandemonium At KISSTORY & Sam's Turbulent Plane Journey | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Pete has entered his icon era and it turns out that he cannot go anywhere without being swarmed by fans…Sam on the other hand is busy securing the duo documentaries about hair transplants. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram, TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 34: Kady McDermott | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam has finally convinced Pete to let him have ONE Love Islander from this series of Love Island on the podcast. Kady McDermott is here to spill the tea and she doesn’t hold back after what has been an explosive series! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: BONUS: Sam and Pete React To YOUR Gig & Festival Stories - The Pleasure Pass Special, with Magnum | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Surprise! We’re dropping this bonus episode special in collaboration with the wonderful Magnum to celebrate the launch of their Pleasure Pass - your free access to some wicket events, festivals and gigs happening across the UK this summer! We’ll be chatting about our favourite (or most hilarious and embarrassing) live event moments, and as a special treat we hear from our listeners for their stories too! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now.

item.title: 33: Pete Allegedly Has A Secret Wife & Sam Was Refused Entry To The Ritz | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Another episode, another mention of Maya Jama… And Sam is on a mission to get her on the podcast. Pete discovers that the internet thinks he has a secret wife. Plus, hear how Sam had to borrow some clothes to secure his entry to The Ritz. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 32: Sam Auditions for Casualty & Pete Reacts To An Ex's Engagement Announcement | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Back with a solo episode, Sam tries to find out EXACTLY how Pete reacted when he found out about Megan McKenna’s engagement and also tries really hard to convince us that he’s a good actor… You can vote for us at the Listeners’ Choice Award here at The British Podcast Awards. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 31: Zara McDermott | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description The episode you’ve all been waiting for - Zara McDermott finally agreed to come on the podcast and Sam quickly regretted that decision when Zara and Pete teamed up against him. We hear from Zara about her dream reality show, why she won’t work with Sam, and the famous ‘You Can’ moment. You don’t want to miss this. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now.

item.title: 30: Pete Is Going To Extreme Lengths To Not Be Cancelled & Sam Ambushed Lorraine Kelly | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Back with a solo episode, Pete has discovered the production team really have his back (or at least for now …) Plus, Sam accosted TV’s sweetheart whilst live. On a show named after her. Brilliant. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 29: Jordan North | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Jordan North has our heart after this episode with him. We hear from Jordan about his shared nemesis with Sam, climbing the slippery ladder to a Radio 1 show, slip-ups on live TV, hair transplant aspirations, stylist stories, and more! Strap in. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 28: Sam Lies About Pete In Interviews & Pete Came Face-To-Face With His Nemesis | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Pete & Sam, Sam & Pete, catch up just the two of them. Be prepared for a lot of confusion as to why (just WHY) they weren’t included in a recent big show. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 27: Michael & Hilary Whitehall | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Michael Whitehall and Pete Wicks are in the same room. Will the universe implode? Judging by the shocking stories - probably. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast. To get in touch with the podcast, email stayingrelevant@insanityhq.

item.title: 26: Pete Joined A Biker Gang & Sam Had An Odd Encounter With A Taxi Driver | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description This is why Sam should never be let out without Pete. And actually Pete without Sam … Should they just always be together?! Pete is fresh back from a trip of a lifetime with stories, and Sam had to, well, schmooze. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 25: Pete & Sam's Disastrous Night At The KSI Fight | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description It’s the story we’ve all been waiting for. And it’s worth the wait. And it’s worth its own episode. Get stuck in. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast. To get in touch with the podcast, email stayingrelevant@insanityhq.

item.title: 24: Sam Finally Met His Nemesis & Pete Was Accosted At Buckingham Palace | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description We’re back with a solo episode and the boys have some stories to tell! Sam & Pete have been on outings to The Podcast Show and Buckingham Palace, in their desperate attempts to Stay Relevant. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 23: Laura Woods | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description It’s only bloody Laura Woods on the podcast! Sam & Pete were over the moon and weren’t afraid to show it. Laura tells us about that moment with Anthony Joshua, dating life, football broadcasting, and so much more. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 22: Chloe Burrows | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam finally got his ultimate wish and got an ex-Love Islander on the podcast (we still don’t know how he convinced Pete. Perhaps Pete just didn’t know about it …) Chloe Burrows joins Sam & Pete to share Love Island secrets, the truth about the Chloe x Millie dream friendship, and who’s in her DMs. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now.

item.title: 21: Pete Does Dressage & Sam Reveals If He Won The Radio Award (He Didn't) | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam has a bee in his bonnet (when does he not?) about being referred to as “former Celebrity Big Brother contestant” and Pete reveals a secret skill … Plus, Sam’s pushing the boundaries of radio but not far enough to win an award sadly. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 20: Sam's Been Bullying Pete Again & Pete Had A Run-In With Declan Rice | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Two words. Declan Rice. Six more words. Pete responds to latest Towie feud. Pete has a blinder this week and it’s not one to miss. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast. To get in touch with the podcast, email stayingrelevant@insanityhq.

item.title: 19: Pete’s Being Psychoanalysed & Sam’s In A Feud | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete may have had their favourite listener letter EVER! Plus, Pete has chosen Sam’s Staying Relevant moment for this week and is also feeling quite used … Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 18: Sam Almost Emergency Landed A Plane & Pete's Been Impersonated | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam is back from holiday but it was FAR from stress-free. He’s also delighted to have unlocked the next level of fame but it seems Pete got there a long time ago … Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 17: Saffron Barker | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description We’ve got a guest baby, and it’s a good’un! Saffron joins Sam & Pete to share her secrets to stardom, and we can only hope that Sam & Pete learn a thing or two! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. item.title: 16: Pete Almost Swore On National Radio & Sam’s Naked On A Billboard | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description You may have spotted “Spam” out and about this week … And maybe more of them than you quite expected! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast. To get in touch with the podcast, email stayingrelevant@insanityhq.

item.title: 15: Sam Had An Accident On Live TV & Pete's In A Music Video | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam has been holding onto a nugget of information from the Love Island final, and boy oh boy is it worth the wait. Plus, Pete sets the record straight about the bullying rumours (there’s the press headline already - you’re welcome journalists). Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 14: Pete's Playing Quidditch & Sam Took New Headshots | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Let’s give you the headlines for this week shall we? Sam hired a photographer to take new headshots and recounts his first strip club visit, and Pete is being coerced into playing quidditch (and calls vlogging V-Logging). Enjoy! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 13: Sam Has A Secret Blog & Pete Was Heckled | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description A number has factors had let to Pete feeling quite old this week. Plus, Sam has been keeping a corner of the internet secret until now … Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 12: Pete Makes A Formal Complaint About Sam | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Pete has gone through the “official podcast channels” to make a formal complaint to Sam, and Sam had no idea before he entered the studio. Strap in. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast. Subscribe to us on YouTube @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 11: Sam Scored A Documentary & Pete Can See Ghosts | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description So. Pete has never had a dream. We’ll just leave that there. Oh, and Sam discovered the best way to get a TV show was to do a documentary (read into that what you will). Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 10: Pete Tried The Influencer Game & Sam Is The Next Soap Opera Star | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description This week, Pete learnt the hard way that the influencer game isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Plus, Sam is rubbing shoulders with VIPs again (but whether he’s had a warm reception is another story …) Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. Follow us on Instagram & TikTok @stayingrelevantpodcast.

item.title: 9: Sam's Catastrophic Interviews & Pete's Mistaken Identity | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description You didn’t think we were gone for good, did you? Sam & Pete are back with a BANG! If you define a bang as Pete being mistaken by an MP for another star, Sam taking Zara to a “cat cafe”, and more disastrous interviews (but this time not on the podcast). Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 8: Series Finale: Christmas Special | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description This is it. The end. (Until we’re back next year of course.) In this Christmas Special we hand it over to you, the listeners, for your favourite Sam & Pete stories including the times you actually met them. Sam & Pete hadn’t heard these before and had NO idea what to expect. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 7: Joe Marler | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Is the world of sport the only one Sam & Pete haven’t had a stab at? This week’s episode may have changed their mind. They are joined by rugby (or as Sam calls it “rugger”) legend Joe Marler to hear the behind-the-scenes stories you wouldn’t know, his genuine take on The Haka, and how to smash podcasting (Sam & Pete are eager to learn). Listen to The Joe Marler show here and follow on all socials @joemarlershow.

item.title: 6: Sam & Pete Part 4 | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Pete & Sam are back. Back without a guest but back nonetheless! This week find out their celebrity nemeses (everyone has one), the time Sam fell madly in love with a dancer he had paid for the company of, and have we found the most Staying Relevant “celebrity” of all time?! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 5: Grace Keeling ("GK Barry") | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete’s latest theory is that relevance can be spread by osmosis. To test this out, they’ve managed to entrap one of the most relevant podcast and TikTok stars in the studio to soak up some fame. It’s Grace Keeling, but you’ll know her as GK Barry! Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 4: Sam & Pete Part 3 | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete, Pete & Sam, Sam & Pete - they are back with another instalment of trying to make it. Big time. This week, it’s Pete & Sam shopping, the “Strictly Curse”, Love Islander fashion edits (are they what they same), and hemorrhoidss (naturally). Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 3: Tom Grennan | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description They said it couldn’t be done, but we got a guest! Whether or not it’s a personal favour is not the point. Sam & Pete are joined by chart-topping singer-songwriter Tom Grennan to hear about his quietest gigs, hecklers, and writing-off his cars. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: 2: Sam & Pete Part 2 | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Sam & Pete are back! There’s no guest this week, but not for lack of trying! We hear what the pair have done this week to Stay Relevant including panto requests, Love Island star launches, and sell-out calendars. Plus, we throw it back to Queuegate - is it the “Sidebar of Shame” moment of the year? Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now.

item.title: 1: Sam & Pete Are Staying Relevant | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description It is time to Stay Relevant. What have the boys done on their quest for fame this week? Well, Sam keeps ruining Pete’s meetings with TV commissioners but Sam’s convinced it’s Pete’s age. There’s probably a few more stories thrown in there too. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast.

item.title: Staying Relevant: Coming Monday 31st October '22 | Staying Relevant
item.description: Podcast Description Join Sam & Pete on their weekly quest for fame and this time - they’re not holding back. First episode is live from Monday 31st October ‘22. Listen by clicking ‘Play’ on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever it is you’re listening now. Make sure to Subscribe or Follow, Rate and Review to help others find the podcast. To get in touch with the podcast, email stayingrelevant@insanityhq.com Staying Relevant®, this has been an Insanity Podcasts production.
